alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Livingston; Monroe; Northern Erie; Ontario; Orleans; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 11:38PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wyoming, east central Erie, Livingston, southeastern Orleans, Genesee, southwestern Monroe and west central Ontario Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1137 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Attica and moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Chili, Batavia, Geneseo, Brighton, Gates-North Gates, Darien Lakes State Park, Letchworth State Park, Henrietta, Le Roy, Pembroke, Perry, Warsaw, Avon, Bennington, Mount Morris, Honeoye Falls, Alden, Attica and Pavilion. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 6 and 12. Interstate 90 between exits 48A and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Livingston; Monroe; Northern Erie; Ontario; Orleans; Southern Erie; Wyoming
